extension.name: FavSocial
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description: Responsive FavSocial Joomla!3 Module

field.name: moduleAlign
field.label: Module Alignment
field.description: Choose if the icons should be aligned to the left or to the right.

field.name: showIcon1
field.label: Show Icon 1
field.description: Choose if this icon should be displayed or not.

field.name: nameIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Name
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name. For example: fa-twitter or fa-facebook.

field.name: linkIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Link
field.description: Insert the link for this icon. Note that the link must include http:// or https:// (for example: https://twitter.com/favthemes, not twitter.com/favthemes).

field.name: colorIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Color
field.description: The color for the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: bgColorIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Background Color
field.description: The color for the background of the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: fontSizeIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the icon. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: paddingIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Padding
field.description: Set the padding for the icon. The padding shorthand property sets all the padding properties in one declaration for top, right, bottom and left padding. This property can have from one to four values. Please insert the numbers using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: borderRadiusIcon1
field.label: Icon 1 Border Radius
field.description: Choose the border-radius for the background of the icon. Note that this option does not work in IE7-8 due to lack of border-radius support. Please insert the number using pixels (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: nameIconStack1
field.label: Icon 1 Stack
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon that you want to stack on top of the first icon. This feature is optional, you can leave this field blank if you do not wish to stack an icon on top of the first icon.

field.name: colorIconStack1
field.label: Icon 1 Stack Color
field.description: The color for the icon that you want to stack on top of the first icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: fontSizeIconStack1
field.label: Icon 1 Stack Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the icon that you want to stack on top of the first icon. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).
